wiki.name: Practicing Feedback Writing
wiki.intro:
What are some "timely, specific, and task-oriented" points of feedback that youÂ might provide to the author of this piece of writing? Take this opportunity to see a range of feedback ideas from your peers. Write your comments exactly as if you were writing on the student's paper! (Don't miss this chance to practice feedback!)

Click on the Edit tab to add your ideas. Be sure to include your name in parentheses after your addition.
